I was looking forward to this collection, but it appears to be corrupted.  WinDefender found TrojanDownloader:Win32/Lnkget.C in Ton Koopman\J.S. Bach - Organ Works CD10\22.mp3.  To eddie, you might look into this issue.
Wonderful collection -- thank you so much.
Thank you so much.  Downloaded it without a problem.  The notes are excellent, too.  I think Koopman is the best performer of Bach's keyboard music.
